prompts.prompt:
Create a Component for an "e-learning" site with a list of courses.
Style it beautifully with Tailwind and Radix Themes elements. Connect it to the index page.
Add one long horizontal row per "course" that takes the length of the page.
Inside each row add one large thumbnail for the course.
Use stock images from the web as thumbnails for professional looking courses. 
Align the thumbnail to the left.
Next to the thumbnail add one smaller text for the category of the course.
Below that a Larger font with the Title
and Last the author of the course.

At the right end of each course row add a bookmark button at the bottom of the row. 
Also add rounded corners and a hover effect using Tailwind css classname
Add some color to the whole page

The thumbnail should be initially larger and fixed size, if needed to resize when screen resizes then it needs to scale proportionally .
Make the button smaller, smaller font white background, darker blue border and font.
Add a 3 dot menu on the left of the button with options to "Add to Collection" and "Share"

All the courses thumbnails need to be the same size.
Use a "…" instead of "+" for the existent options menu
The menu should not be visible at the start and open only once per row when clicking on the "…".
So if one row is clicked the other menus should hide and show only the one clicked

Make the thumbnail and title of each row a link, for now going to a dummy destination: "www.youtube.com".
Add a sorting option on the top right of the list with label "Sort By" and a dropdown menu with options "Rating"  and "Alphabetical Order". The menu should be hidden at the start.
Add a value to each row that shows the "rating" of each course with a range from 0 to 5 using decimals like 4.5
And make the list of courses sortable by rating or alphabetical order of the title.
add 3 more example of courses with random ratings from 1 to 4 using also decimals like 3.5
